page.title: 09 EDUCATION.......SCHOOL
page.content: When we are four and a half years old we can start school.Children from outlying farms are picked up by taxi, and all the Perry children come by bus. Our school has about 155 children and six classes, each with its own teacher. Our school uniform colours are maroon and grey, and we have our own, specially designed sweatshirt. School starts at 8.45 a.m. and finishes at 3.15 p.m. Nearly all the children stay at school at dinner time, but about a half of us bring a packed lunch instead of eating the school-prepared meal. We are a very happy school; the older children like to play with the little ones at playtime and help them. Our P.T.A. raises money to buy us some 'extras'. When we are 11 most of us go to Longsands School in St.Neots.
